column4: Hello im using ubuntus X with FGLRX drivers with my Ati Radeon X800 PCI-E and whenever i go to console my computer freezes Completely and i have to restart. Can anyone help?
Hello im using ubuntus X with FGLRX drivers with my Ati Radeon X800 PCI-E and whenever i go to console my computer freezes Completely and i have to restart. Can anyone help?
nothing surprising there unfortunately, recent drivers versions have that fixed in most cases though. Check the /topic of #ATI
